channel.title: Releases on plgd
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on plgd

item.title: Hugo 0.82: Mostly bugfixes
item.description: This is a small release, mostly a maintainance/bugfix release. But also notable is that you can now add custom Markdown attributes (e.g. CSS classes) to code fences (aed7df62 @bep #8278) and that you can use the attribute lists in title render hooks (.Attributes; see cd0c5d7e @bep #8270). This release represents 28 contributions by 8 contributors to the main Hugo code base.@bep leads the Hugo development with a significant amount of contributions, but also a big shoutout to @moorereason, and @gzagatti for their ongoing contributions.
